en-GB.summary: Voice assistance for University of Cambridge CAPE SEM
en-GB.name: Voice Microscope
en-GB.description:
4th year project of Cindy Lam, University of Cambridge
(some functions require a passcode to be enabled)

1. Get Variable: "Show me the variable list"
2. Set Magnification: "Set magnification to {number (X)} / increase magnification"
3. Set Brightness: "Set brightness to {number (%)} / decrease brightness"
4. Set Contrast: "Set contrast to {number (%)} / reduce contrast"
5. Auto-Fine Align: "Auto align"
6. Auto-Fine Focus: "Auto focus"
7. Auto-Stig: "Auto stig"
8. Update Image: "Update image"
9. Get Stage Position: "What are the stage positions"
10. Set Stage Position: "Move stage to {direction} by {number (in um)} / move stage to the {direction}"
11. Set Image Position: "Move image to the {direction} by {number(in um)} / move image {direction}"
12. Save Stage Position: "Save stage positions to preset {integer}"
13. Call Stage Position: "Move to preset {integer}"
14. Run-up: "Turn on the sem/gun"
15. Shut Down: "Shut down the sem/gun"
16. Save Image to Cloud: "Save image to google cloud"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Only for private use, will not public
